alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 11:23AM EST until December 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Buncombe, Caldwell Mountains, Burke Mountains and McDowell Mountains Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 3 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Buncombe; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains
